End of Day Report Checklist
What are my sales? Total Sales
Grand Total (from recap)
How do I find out what my deposit should be?
Grand Total =
Total Sales
(Your Sales)
( - ) Driver Fees = Driver Fee
(Driver Commissions)
(+) Paid Ins =
Pay Ins
(Pay Ins)
( - ) Paid Outs = Pay Outs
(Pay Outs)
(+) Gift Cert. Sold = Gift Certificates
(Certificates Sold)
Total Amount Tendered = Total Tendered
Credit Cards, House Accounts, Gift Cards, etc. brought back must be subtracted
Total (From Above) = Total Tendered
( - ) Credit Cards (Use Batch) = Credit Card Totals
( - ) House Accounts = House Accounts
( - ) Checks = Checks
( - ) Purchase Orders = Purchase Orders
Total Cash Deposit = Total Deposit
Total Money Counted = Counted Money
Short/Over = Short or Over
